entry.title: Types of Watch Movements
entry.content:
Watch Movements The movement, or caliber, is the engine which powers a watch and its functions. This internal mechanism of the timepiece moves the hands and powers all features of the watch such as the chronograph, annual calendar, moon phase, or dual time zone. As the driving force of all timekeeping functions, a movement is...
